item.source: Why do YOU play on PRIVATE SERVERS?

item.title: Why do YOU play on PRIVATE SERVERS?
item.dc:creator: @GetOwned GetOwned
item.description:
@GetOwned wrote:

Tired of getting hacked in rs. Lost about 40m so far. In priv’s, 40m isn’t much. I eventually get bored of priv’s and go back to rs for a while, then get hacked or something again, then come back to priv’s. Its a never-ending cycle. Lol.

Read full topic
item.source: Why do YOU play on PRIVATE SERVERS?

item.title: Why do YOU play on PRIVATE SERVERS?
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

[quote=“Nirvana.Marijuana, post:18, topic:71133”][quote author=Zacknight25 link=topic=104539.msg1052814#msg1052814 date=1174887185]
its just to hard to lvl up in real rs when u get to lvl 70-80 stats
[/quote]

Lol a little hard work never killed anyone

[hr][br][quote author=MastrChief link=topic=104539.msg1059715#msg1059715 date=1175094626]
I was banned on 7 accounts

I thought I had the right to freedom of speech
[/quote]

Lol you have to follow the rules you noob just like on here

[hr][br][quote author=Morgarath link=topic=104539.msg1052400#msg1052400 date=1174880849]
-.- funnny
[/quote]

And your spamming. Reported.[/quote]

Think before you post, I follow the rules here.

I simply expressed my opinion to jagex, they felt I was irrational, they banned me, I got a little angry. Don’t automatically assume I would act the same way here, theres no reason except because of your comment. STFU or GTFO!

In other news, I think ALOT of people come to moparscape to try the new features since its so “hard” to acquire them in runescape. Moparscape is alot easier and allows people to “max out” quickly, get all those items they couldn’t get in runescape, and get to do things they couldn’t normally do.

Read full topic
item.source: Why do YOU play on PRIVATE SERVERS?

item.title: Why do YOU play on PRIVATE SERVERS?
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

[quote=“ghoulman5, post:25, topic:71133”]lol make it a hot topic ppl[br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2007, 08:59:21 PM[/size][hr]love me i made it a hot topic hahahaha ;D[br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2007, 09:00:13 PM[/size][hr]dang it wont work im trying[br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2007, 09:00:34 PM[/size][hr]yes i sound liek a noob…[/quote]Stop spamming with your thousands of posts

And I don’t “play” on them foresay…I just have nothing else to do…Hmm…Ive only been on 3 servers before and that because I was given admin on them for helping out (cookscape, b3rnscape) and then theres my own, but i just got a 72 error with a huge thing i did, and i tried to take it off, but my compiler just keeps giving me more and more errors…Oh well…I have a back up client.java which is 27 updates behind my 212 update one so ill have to do a lot of updating tomorrow.

Read full topic
